author: Trenker
subject: Re: DVD - 1st Series Lupin the 3rd Questions
body:
>1. Where can I buy them online? I need an online shop which does take
>overseas order

You can buy them at  http://www.euroanime.com/

----- Original Message -----
From: "Luis Cruz" <cruzl@ccs.neu.edu>
To: <lupin AT mcs DOT kent DOT edu>
Sent: Monday, October 09, 2000 8:57 PM
Subject: Re: [lupin] DVD - 1st Series Lupin the 3rd Questions


> > I bought myself the 1st series on DVD this summer.
> > It was just released by Yamato Video in Italy.
>
> From speaking with other Italian anime fans, I understand that anime
> tends to get censored for TV broadcast.  IIRC, Lupin did get some
> edits to be shown on TV; do you know if the DVDs present the entire
> episode uncut/uncensored?

Only in TV it was censored, the DVDs are uncensored.

> --
> Luis A. Cruz
> cruzl@ccs.neu.edu
